called just before the scene is unloaded.

true: node was a top level node, and has been removed.

public Node createNode (String name) throws InvalidNodeException

simpler alternative for createVrmlFromString(" name {} ").

public void setNodeName (Node newNode, String newName) throws IllegalArgumentException
set name of node to newName (blaxxunCC3D)

node will be availabe afterwards to getNode(newName) application is responsible, that node is or will be part of the current scene.

public Node getWorld () throws InvalidNodeException
returns top level blaxxunCC3D Scene group node, holding the VRML world (blaxxunCC3D)

get the eventout "children" to acess all top level nodes.

public void replaceWorld (Node node) throws IllegalArgumentException
Replace the current world with the passed node optimized case, where node is a "Scene" node (blaxxunCC3D).

private blaxxuncc3d IblaxxunCC3D findCC3D (java.applet.Applet applet)
return an instance of the IblaxxunCC3D

IE : scans the context to find handle to CC3D control

.

public Browser getBrowser (java.applet.Applet pApplet)
return an instance of the Browser class

Netscape : This returns the first embedded plugin in the current frame.

IE : call setControl(handleOfVrmlControl) first or use getBrowser(handleOfVrmlControl)

.

public Browser getBrowser (java.applet.Applet pApplet, String frameName, int index)
return an instance of the Browser class

Netscape : If frameName is NULL, current frame is assumed.

IE : call setControl(handleOfVrmlControl)

or blaxxunCC3DControl.SetControl(ctrlObject,applet) first

or use simply getBrowser(handleOfVrmlControl)

.

public Browser getBrowser (Object bxCtrl)
return an instance of the Browser class, used for Internet Explorer : input is handle to blaxxunCC3D Active X Control

Netscape : not supported

. More...

Netscape : not supported

. More...

free the control object (blaxxunCC3D)

Netscape : not supported

private final _Guid IID_IDispatch
private final _Guid SID_SContainerDispatch
private int tries

Detailed Description

VRML External Interface class for blaxxunCC3D control For example:. 

 
    Browser = Browser.getBrowser(handleOfControl);

Member Function Documentation

public String IBrowser::getName () [inline]

Get the "name" of the VRML browser (browser-specific).

Returns:
name of the browser "blaxxunCC3D" for blaxxunCC3D

public String IBrowser::getVersion () [inline]

Get the "version" of the VRML browser (browser-specific).

Returns:
version of the browser

public float IBrowser::getCurrentSpeed () [inline]

Get the current velocity of the bound viewpoint in meters/sec, if available, or 0.0 if not.

Returns:
current speed

public float IBrowser::getCurrentFrameRate () [inline]

Get the current frame rate of the browser, or 0.0 if not available.

Returns:
current frame rate

public String IBrowser::getWorldURL () [inline]

Get the URL for the root of the current world, or an empty string if not available.

Returns:
url

public void IBrowser::replaceWorld (Node[] nodes) [inline]

Replace the current world with the passed array of nodes.

Parameters:
nodes   The array of nodes
Returns:
url

public void IBrowser::loadURL (String[] url, String[] parameter) [inline]

Load the given URL with the passed parameters (as described in the Anchor node).

Parameters:
url   The array of urls (blaxxunCC3D uses only the element at index 0
parameter   The array of params

public void IBrowser::setDescription (String description) [inline]

Set the description of the current world in a browser-specific manner.

To clear the description, pass an empty string as argumentLoad the given URL with the passed parameters (as described in the Anchor node)

Parameters:
description   the string, will be displayed in status line of browser

public Node [] IBrowser::createVrmlFromString (String vrmlSyntax)

Parse STRING into a VRML scene and return the list of root nodes for the resulting scene.

Parameters:
vrmlSyntax   string with a valid vrml syntax string (without VRML header)
Returns:
an array of nodes, if the length is 0 this also means a syntax error or a bad string

public void IBrowser::createVrmlFromURL (String[] url, Node node, String event) [inline]

Tells the browser to load a VRML scene from the passed URL or URLs.

After the scene is loaded, an event is sent to the MFNode eventIn in node NODE named by the EVENT argument

Parameters:
url   url to be loaded
node   node with MFNode event in
eventName   Event in of node e.g. "addChildren" or "set_children"

public Node IBrowser::getNode (String name) [inline]

Get a DEFed node by name.

Nodes given names in the root scene graph must be made available to this method. DEFed nodes in inlines, as well as DEFed nodes returned from createVrmlFromString/URL, may or may not be made available to this method, depending on the browser's implementation

Parameters:
name   node name
Returns:
node if found or exception if node is not present

public void IBrowser::addRoute (Node fromNode, String fromEventOut, Node toNode, String toEventIn) [inline]

Add a route between the specified eventOut and eventIn of the given nodes.

Parameters:
fromNode   source node
fromEventOut   event out name eg. "fraction_changed"
toNode   destination node
toEventIn   event int name eg. "set_fraction"

public void IBrowser::deleteRoute (Node fromNode, String fromEventOut, Node toNode, String toEventIn) [inline]

Delete a route between the specified eventOut and eventIn of the given nodes.

Parameters:
fromNode   source node
fromEventOut   event out name eg. "fraction_changed"
toNode   destination node
toEventIn   event int name eg. "set_fraction"

public void IBrowser::beginUpdate () [inline]

notify browser of a batch of EAI operations requiring no temporay update

a call of beginUpdate must be followed by endUpdate, begin/end Updatecalls can be nested.

public void IBrowser::endUpdate () [inline]

end batch of EAI operations.

public void IBrowser::initialize () [inline]

called after the scene is loaded, before the first event is processed.

public void IBrowser::shutdown () [inline]

called just before the scene is unloaded.

result is old timerInterval usefull to reduce systemload if greater numbers 200 - 500 or get more frequent updates of lower numbers 10 ..

public void IBrowser::setViewpointByValue (float[] position, float[] orientation, int mode) [inline, private]

set the bound viewpoint to the specified value.

Parameters:
float   [3] position
float   [4] orientation
int   mode 1 => animate, 4 => relative modus: position = translation, orientation = rotation

public void IBrowser::getViewpointByValue (float[] position, float[] orientation, int mode) [inline, private]

get the current viewpoint position.

Parameters:
float   [3] result position
float   [4] result orientation
int   mode, 0 => local viewpoint, 1 => global viewpoint, 2 => 3dperson view

public boolean IBrowser::getNodeBoundingBox (Node node, int mode, float[] minimum, float[] maximum) [inline, private]

get the bounding box of a node.

Parameters:
Node   nod to check
int   mode = 1 => don't use defined bboxes (only calculated bboxes)
float   [3] result min point
float   [3] result max point
Returns:
boolean true if bounding box available

public Object IBrowser::getComObject (int objectId) [inline, private]

get a C++ direct X/RSX object, only reusable in C!!!

Parameters:
int   objectId:
DIRECTDRAW = 0
DIRECT3D = 1
DIRECT3DDEVICE = 2
DIRECT3DVIEWPORT = 3
DD_FRONTBUFFER = 4
DD_BACKBUFFER = 5
DD_ZBUFFER = 6
DIRECTSOUND = 7
DIRECTSOUND3DLISTENER = 8
RSX = 9
RSX_LISTENER = 10

Returns:
com object (com.ms.com.IUnknown)

private blaxxuncc3d IblaxxunCC3D IBrowser::findCC3D (java.applet. Applet applet) [inline, static, private]

return an instance of the IblaxxunCC3D

IE : scans the context to find handle to CC3D control

.

public Browser IBrowser::getBrowser (java.applet. Applet pApplet) [inline, static, private]

return an instance of the Browser class

Netscape : This returns the first embedded plugin in the current frame.

IE : call setControl(handleOfVrmlControl) first or use getBrowser(handleOfVrmlControl)

.

public Browser IBrowser::getBrowser (java.applet. Applet pApplet, String frameName, int index) [inline, static, private]

return an instance of the Browser class

Netscape : If frameName is NULL, current frame is assumed.

IE : call setControl(handleOfVrmlControl)

or blaxxunCC3DControl.SetControl(ctrlObject,applet) first

or use simply getBrowser(handleOfVrmlControl)

.

public Browser IBrowser::getBrowser (Object bxCtrl) [inline, static, private]

return an instance of the Browser class, used for Internet Explorer : input is handle to blaxxunCC3D Active X Control

Netscape : not supported
